pylayers.signal.bsignal.Usignal.setx¶

Usignal.setx(start, stop, dx)[source]¶

set the x array of the Usignal (y=0)

Parameters :

start : float

stop : float

dx : float

Examples

>>> u = Usignal()
>>> u.setx(0,10,0.1)
